variants.Description in input context: c.139C>T (predicted to alter a critical cysteine residue)

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the SH-SY5Y dopaminergic neuronal cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Cells expressing the DJ-1 variant NM_004764.4:c.139C>T exhibited a 30% decrease in cell viability under oxidative stress conditions compared to control cells.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: An empty vector served as the negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Cell viability greater than 80% under oxidative stress conditions.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Cell viability less than 50% under oxidative stress conditions.
